name: Last Minute Escape
description:
This game was created as a part of the 2018 Gamemaker's Toolkit Game Jam!

The theme this year was: Genre, but without mechanic.

Our game is a Room-Escape game where you can't touch anything!*

Enjoy!

*at least until, you can.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Do you think you could beat an escape room in less than 2 minutes??
No?
...
... But what if you could cheat?

In this game, you'll play as an escape artist gifted with Ghost Powers! Give yourself a leg up by scouting the puzzles out as a Ghost!

Use -Ghost Vision- to peer through objects and find clues to piece together how this puzzle room works. You can also phase through doors! 

Keep in mind that as a Ghost, you won't be able to interact with anything!!!

When you're ready, press start! you'll have 2 minutes to carry out your pre-prepared escape plan!

Good luck!

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Extract the .ZIP file to a folder. 

Double click the .exe to play the game!
